attributes.action: Make all retailers recycle/make business recycling mandatory
attributes.background: Massive high street retailers produce tonnes of plastic and cardboard waste each day and none of it gets recycled! As much good as home recycling can do so much of the problem lies with big companies! this waste will go to landfill, pollute our land end up in our oceans.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

There are already legal requirements on retailers and other businesses to recycle some of the packaging the produce. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/packaging-producer-responsibilities

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to change these rules if that is something you would like to see happen.
